content:
If your organization uses Salesforce Knowledge, you can enable your agents to answer customer questions by using information from your knowledge base. Set up chat answers on articles so that agents can search for articles from Chat in the Salesforce console.

Available in: Salesforce Classic and Performance Editions, Unlimited Edition and Enterprise Edition with Service Cloud.

To set this up, you need:

Customize Application permission
Manage Knowledge permission

The legacy chat product is scheduled for retirement. To avoid service interruptions, migrate to Messaging for In-App and Web before February 14, 2026.

Create a custom field called "Chat Answer" in article types. This field stores information from the article that's appropriate to share with customers during a live chat.

From Setup, enter Knowledge Article Types, create or edit an article type, add a new field, select Text, Text Area, or Text Area (Long), specify security settings, and make the field visible to authors, editors, and live chat agents.
title: Setting Up Chat Answers from Knowledge Articles in Service Cloud
